entry.title: Friday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 21. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow this evening. Clearing before morning. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. High minus 19. Wind chill near minus 33. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 24. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 29 in the evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 27 January 2023
